com.pholser.junit.quickcheck

Annotation Type ForAll

  • Deprecated. 
    Rather than writing property-based tests as Theory methods with parameters marked with this annotation, write them as Property methods on classes run with the JUnitQuickcheck runner.

    @Deprecated
 @Target(value=PARAMETER)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ForAll
    Mark a parameter of a Theory method with this annotation to have random values supplied to it.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int discardRatio
      Deprecated. 
       
      int sampleSize
      Deprecated. 
       
      long seed
      Deprecated. 
       
      String suchThat
      Deprecated. 
       

    • Element Detail

      • sampleSize

        public abstract int sampleSize
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the number of generated values to give the annotated parameter
        Default:
        100

      • discardRatio

        public abstract int discardRatio
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the ratio of discarded generated values to successful generated values above which values will no longer be generated. For a negative value, generation will cease immediately. For a zero value, generation will stop if the number of discarded generated values exceeds the sample size.
        Default:
        0

      • suchThat

        public abstract String suchThat
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        an OGNL expression used to constrain the values fed to the annotated theory parameter. The expression should evaluate to a boolean value. Within the expression, "_" refers to the theory parameter.
        Default:
        ""

      • seed

        public abstract long seed
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        a value to be used as the initial seed for the random value generator. Not specifying a value causes the seed to be chosen in the usual JDK way.
        Default:
        0L
